wind.defaultMessage:
No wind messages have arrived yet.

When one does, a butterfly will flutter by your mailbox to let you know.

Sending a message to someone can also become a quiet and beautiful gift.

Try releasing one gently from the ‚úâÔ∏è message app, and let it ride the wind.

about.title: OS Yamato - ver.0
about.conceptText: OS Yamato is a new kind of OS that embraces the idea: "If a record is not touched, it returns to the wind." It avoids hoarding data, and stays quiet and gentle.
about.feature.calendar: Calendar: Use templates to stay organized
about.feature.memo: Memos, Contacts, and Wind Messages: Keep only what you need, lightly
about.feature.photo: Photos: Organize them and let them return to the wind
terms.title: Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
terms.body:
OS Yamato is based on the philosophy that "a record, if left untouched, returns to the wind."

All data is temporarily stored in the cloud, but it will be automatically deleted if not accessed for a certain period (currently 365 days without viewing). This retention period may change without prior notice.

Your records will bloom, ride the wind, and eventually fade away.
We invite you to enjoy their impermanence ‚Äî freely and peacefully.

‚ñ† Important Notes
„ÉªThis service does not guarantee permanent preservation of your data.
„ÉªData that has exceeded the retention period will be automatically deleted and cannot be recovered.
„ÉªWe are not responsible for data loss caused by access issues, communication errors, or user mistakes.
„ÉªWe do not take any responsibility for damages resulting from unauthorized access (such as account hijacking). You are responsible for setting a strong password and changing it regularly.
„ÉªPlease back up important records yourself if necessary.
„ÉªYour personal information will be used solely for authentication and service provision purposes, and will not be shared with third parties (except as required by law).

To use this service, you must review and agree to these terms.
These terms may be updated in the future due to service improvements or legal requirements.
The latest version of the terms can always be viewed in the Settings screen.

This service is provided by an individual developer. For inquiries, please contact us through the "Contact" section in the Settings screen.

iconGuide.title: OS Yamato Hints
iconGuide.access:
Access OS Yamato from any device.
https://hanaco875.com
iconGuide.subtitle:
On smartphones, adding the website icon to your home screen allows you to use it like an app.
Use the share icon or 'Ô∏ô' to add it.
iconGuide.instruction: Tap an icon to see its function.
iconGuide.statusSprout:
The moment life is born.
A quiet, small beginning that starts to sprout.
iconGuide.statusBloom:
Your record grows and blooms.
It will flourish even more as you engage with it.
iconGuide.statusWither:
Preparing to return to the wind.
You can check data that is about to fade.
(Data will be deleted after 365 days)
